alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 2:25PM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5000 feet near Grand Canyon. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM Wednesday: Grand Canyon 7 to 11 inches North Rim 9 to 13 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
